meanings.sent1: The birthday cake was curlicued with colorful frosting.
meanings.sent2: The princess wore a curlicued crown on her head.
meanings.sent3: The curlicued pattern on the curtains made the room feel fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so neat, it looked like curlicued art.
meanings.sent5: The curlicued design on the invitation caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A decorative curl or twist in design or writing.
meanings.sent1: She added a curlicued flourish to the end of her signature.
meanings.sent2: The old book had beautiful curlicues on every page.
meanings.sent3: The artist's painting featured intricate curlicues in the background.
meanings.sent4: The calligrapher's work was admired for its elegant curlicues.
meanings.sent5: The wrought iron gate was adorned with delicate curlicues.
